DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether G17DT Immunogen , administer combination chemotherapy , effective safe treatment gastric cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy G17DT Immunogen Treatment Gastric Gastroesophageal Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Clinical diagnosis gastric gastroesophageal cancer Karnofsky performance status score least 70 Life expectancy least 3 month Exclusion criterion : Prior treatment chemotherapy anticancer immunotherapy Bone marrow transplant within past year Chronic use corticosteroid , except inhaled corticosteroid use asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Central nervous system metastases Immunodeficiency Hypercalcemia
